H1.text: Solar power is an energy source that could involve a dam.

H2.text: Geothermal energy could involve a dam, as the question asks which energy source might involve a dam.

H3.text: Hydroelectric power is an energy source that could involve a dam.

A4.text: A hydroelectric power station that has a dam and reservoir is a flexible source, since the amount of electricity produced can be increased or decreased in seconds or minutes in response to varying electricity demand.
